typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Version as string,
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		GLCode as string,
		GLDescription as string,
		BudgetDate as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual( iifNull(toDecimal(trim(Amount),18,2,'###,###.##'),toDecimal('0.00')) ,0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = iifNull(abs(toDecimal(trim(Amount),18,2,'###,###.##')),toDecimal('0.00')),
		BudgetDate = iifNull(toTimestamp(concat('01-',BudgetDate),'dd-MMM-yy'), toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00')),
		Budget_Type = toString('Budget')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		GL_Code = GLCode,
		Budget_Desc = GLDescription,
		Budget_Date = BudgetDate,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_value = Trx_Amount,
		Budget_Type,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Version_Name = Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GLCode == Relation_GL_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GLCode)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
ValidBudgetDate@ValidBudgetDate select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode = Derived_GL_Code,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
DerivedColumnValidationGLCodeError select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GLCode == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectInvalidBudgetDate union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(BudgetDateConvert = toTimestamp(concat('01-',BudgetDate),'dd-MMM-yy'),
		Derived_GL_Code = trim(GLCode,'\'')) ~> ComputeBudgetDate
ComputeBudgetDate split(not(isNull(BudgetDateConvert)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidBudgetDate@(ValidBudgetDate, InvalidBudgetDate)
ValidBudgetDate@InvalidBudgetDate derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Budget Date')) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidBudgetDate
DerivedColumnInvalidBudgetDate select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectInvalidBudgetDate
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF derive(Validation_Error = toString('GLCode cannot be null')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationGLCodeError
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		{GL-Code} as string,
		{GL-Desc} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Cash-Flow-Code} as string,
		{Parent-GL-Code} as string,
		Level as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		{GL-Code} = Derived_GL_Code,
		{GL-Desc},
		Category,
		{Cash-Flow-Code},
		{Parent-GL-Code} = Derived_Parent_GL_Code,
		Level,
		Debit_Credit = Derived_Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Derived_GL_Code = trim({GL-Code}, '\''),
		Derived_Parent_GL_Code = iif({Parent-GL-Code}=='\'',toString(null()),trim({Parent-GL-Code}, '\'')),
		Derived_Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit)) ~> DerivedColumn
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over({GL-Code}),
	asc({GL-Code}, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID
AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code = {GL-Code},
		GL_Desc = {GL-Desc},
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = {Cash-Flow-Code},
		GL_Parent_Code = {Parent-GL-Code},
		GL_Level_Code = Level,
		Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		GLaccount as string,
		Id as string,
		Src as string,
		Date as string,
		Memo as string,
		Debit as string,
		Credit as string,
		Job as string,
		NetActivity as string,
		EndingBalance as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLaccount,
		Id,
		Date,
		Memo,
		Debit,
		Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns derive(Debit_Credit = case(isNull(Debit),'CR','DR'),
		Trx_Amount = coalesce(toDecimal(Debit,18,2,'$###,###.##'),toDecimal(Credit,18,2,'$###,###.##')),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		GL_Code = GLaccount,
		Trx_Code = Id,
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Desc = Memo,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Databasename as string,
		Roll_Forward_period as string,
		Group_ID as string,
		Attribute_Id as string,
		Origin_id as string,
		Version_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
DerivedValidationError select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Databasename,
		Roll_Forward_period,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_Id,
		Origin_id,
		Version_Name,
		validation_error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Group_ID = toInteger(Group_ID),
		Attribute_Id = toInteger(Attribute_Id),
		Origin_id = toInteger(Origin_id),
		Roll_Forward_period = toInteger(Roll_Forward_period)) ~> ConvertStringToInteger
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
ConvertStringToInteger, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalAsset
LookupRelationalAsset derive(validation_error = iif(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID),'Invalid Fund ID or Asset ID',toString(null()))) ~> DerivedValidationError
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		DatabaseName as string,
		Group_ID as integer,
		Attribute_id as integer,
		Origin_id as integer,
		Asset_Offset as integer,
		Version_name as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		DatabaseName = Databasename,
		Group_ID,
		Attribute_id = Attribute_Id,
		Origin_id,
		Asset_Offset = Roll_Forward_period,
		Version_name = Version_Name,
		Validation_Error = validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToStagingDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate = EOM_Rate_Converted,
		Average_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate_Converted
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		EOM_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(EOM_Rate, 18, 7),
		Average_Mon_Rate_Converted = toDecimal(Average_Mon_Rate,18,7)) ~> ConvertStringToStagingDataType
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency),
	asc(Date, false),
	asc(Base_Currency, false),
	asc(Target_Currency, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency
AnalyticFunctionGroupForexDateBaseAndTargetCurrency filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirtRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,7),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,7)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Date,
		Base_Currency,
		Target_Currency,
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		MYOB_Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_master as string,
		Fund_master_name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name = MYOB_Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Fund_master,
		Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage = Fund_Parent_Allocation,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Fund_Parent_Allocation = toDecimal(Fund_Parent_Allocation)) ~> DerivedColumn
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Fund_ID),
	asc(Fund_ID, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID
AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage as decimal(18,2),
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Company_Name,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_Parent_Allocation_percentage,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Allocation_percentage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertAllocationPercentage select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Allocation_percentage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Allocation_percentage = iifNull(toDecimal(trim(Allocation_percentage,'%'), 18, 4, '###.##'),0),
		GL_Code = trim(GL_Code, '\'')) ~> ConvertAllocationPercentage
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Allocation_percent as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Allocation_percent = Allocation_percentage
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		{GL Code} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
TrimGLCode select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code = {GL Code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive({GL Code} = trim({GL Code}, '\'')) ~> TrimGLCode
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Start_Date as string,
		End_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
CheckAmoutNotNull@ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2))) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount,
		Start_Date,
		End_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns

		Date,
